Jumbotron.title: Hi, I'm NiyasRahman.
Jumbotron.text: My name's Niyas Rahman. I'm a front-end developer from Kerala, India and Welcome to my site. I work with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My current projects use ReactJS as the view library.

sideproject.title: Flexbox 101
sideproject.para: Flexbox 101 is a playground for developers who want to try out flexbox with the live interactive UI.

sideproject.title: Gatsby source dailymotion
sideproject.para: Source plugin for pulling data into Gatsby from dailymotion user videos endpoint.

sideproject.title: How it works
sideproject.para: howitworks.ml is a blog which teaches you deep things about front end stuff. we are building this project with very interesting stacks

sideproject.title: Schema Generator
sideproject.para: Schema Generator is a SEO tool to make schema markup creates an enhanced description (commonly known as a rich snippet)

sideproject.title: The CSS Show
sideproject.para: The CSS Show is a YouTube Channel. there I post speed art kind of video for CSS Like Making hamburger menu using CSS and js
